chapter.title: XSL Launching and Debugging
chapter.para: The XSL Tooling adds support for XSL Launch and Debugging configurations. These allow you to setup XSL configurations for various jobs, and to also debug xsl stylsheet transformations.

section.title: XSL Launching
section.para: In the Project Explorer, simply select the input XML file and the stylesheet(s) to transform it, and then right-click and select Run As > XSL Transformation.
